    var href = java.getString(".chapterPages a@href");
    if (href) {
        var segs = href.split('/').filter(Boolean);
        var dir = segs[segs.length-2];
        var prefix = segs.pop().split('_')[0];
        var domain = baseUrl.match(/^https?:\/\/[^/]+/)[0];        
        var urls = [];
        for (var i = 2; i <= p[1]; i++) {
            urls.push(domain + '/' + dir + '/' + prefix + '_' + i + '.html');
        }
        urls;

} else []

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>
